sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({selector:'app-about',templateUrl:'./about.component.html',styleUrls:['./about.component.css']}) export class AboutComponent {}

About Me

👨‍💻 Who I Am

I'm Bazmi Uddin, a Full Stack Developer from Gwalior with 3+ years of experience in crafting scalable and modern web applications.

🏢 Current Role

Working at Ubitech Solutions Pvt. Ltd. as a developer & team lead, focusing on HRMS and CRM platforms for enterprise automation.

⚙️ Core Expertise

Hands-on experience with Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter & AdonisJS), and MySQL for full-stack product development.

🚀 What I Do Best

Build efficient, user-focused web solutions combining clean logic, beautiful UI, and robust backend integration.

🎯 Achievements

Implemented dynamic leave policy systems, attendance automation, and improved employee engagement tools in HRMS products.

🌱 Growth Journey

Learned multiple frameworks at Ubitech and mastered Node.js through Simplilearn certified training.

🎓 Education

B.Tech – Information Technology

IPS College of Management & Technology, Gwalior

Graduated: 2021

📜 Node.js Certification

Issued by Simplilearn — Completed on 24th Oct 2025

View Certificate
